name: Lava Land
description:
Created using the "Complete Physics Platformer Kit" by Icarus Studio, purchasable in the Unity Asset Store.

A 3D single-player Platformer Level.

Focus put on progression and flow of the level, how the player is taught and required to use various mechanics, and the overall feeling of risk and reward.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys or WASD to move.

Mouse controls camera.

'SPACE' to Jump.

'E' to grab boxes.
